All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminHospitalStaff
Class for managing hospital staff operations such as viewing, adding, removing, updating, filtering and saving staff records by admin.
AdminInventoryPrompt
The AdminInventory class provides an interface for administrators to manage the medication inventory.
AdminUI
The AdminUI class represents the user interface for administrators in the system.
Appointment
Represents an appointment in the appointment management system.
AppointmentController
The AppointmentController class is responsible for managing appointment records, providing functionalities for administrators, doctors, and patients.
AppointmentFlagUpdater
The AppointmentFlagUpdater class is responsible for updating the status of appointments (e.g., PENDING, CONFIRMED, or CANCELLED) based on user input and predefined rules.
AppointmentLoader
The ApptLoader class is responsible for loading appointment records from a data source and populating a map of appointment records.
AppointmentOutcomeRecord
Represents the outcome of a medical appointment, including details of the appointment, diagnoses, and prescriptions provided.
AppointmentOutcomeRecordController
Controller class for managing appointment outcome records.
AppointmentOutcomeRecordLoader
Responsible for loading appointment outcome records from a data source and storing them.
AppointmentOutcomeRecordSaver
Responsible for saving appointment outcome records to a data source.
AppointmentOutcomeRecordService
Service class for managing the serialization and deserialization of AppointmentOutcomeRecord objects.
AppointmentOutcomeRecordsViewer
Responsible for viewing appointment outcome records.
AppointmentRecordViewer
The ApptRecordViewer class provides functionalities to view appointment records.
AppointmentSaver
The ApptSaver class is responsible for saving appointment records to a data source.
AppointmentService
The AppointmentService class provides methods for managing appointment records, including loading, saving, formatting, and converting between objects and their string representations.
DeleteClassFiles
The DeleteClassFiles class provides functionality to recursively delete all `.class` files from a specified directory and its subdirectories.
DoctorLeaveSetter
The DoctorLeaveSetter class provides functionality for managing leave for doctors.
DoctorMedicalRecordController
The DoctorMedicalRecordController class is responsible for managing medical records associated with a specific doctor.
DoctorMedicalRecordUpdater
The DoctorMedicalRecordUpdater class provides functionality for doctors to update medical records associated with appointments.
DoctorMedicalRecordViewer
The DoctorMedicalRecordViewer class provides functionality for doctors to view medical records of patients.
DoctorScheduleViewer
The DoctorScheduleViewer class provides functionality to view a doctor's schedule.
DoctorUI
The DoctorUI class represents the user interface for doctors in the system.
Flag
The Flag enum represents the various states or statuses that can be assigned to an entity in the system, such as appointments, prescriptions, or timeslots.
Format
The Format interface defines a contract for formatting objects into specific string representations.
Gender
The Gender enum represents the gender categories that can be assigned to a user or entity in the system.
GetUser
The GetUser class provides functionality to retrieve user information from a preloaded collection of users.
HospitalStaffController
The HospitalStaffController class manages hospital staff operations, including adding, removing, updating, filtering, viewing, and saving staff records.
HospitalStaffFilter
The HospitalStaffFilter class provides functionality to filter hospital staff based on specific criteria, such as role, gender, or age.
HospitalStaffUpdater
The HospitalStaffUpdater class provides functionality to update the details of a hospital staff member, including their name, gender, and age.
HospitalStaffViewer
The HospitalStaffViewer class provides functionality to display information about hospital staff members.
InputPrompt
The InputPrompt class provides functionality for capturing user login details.
InventoryController
The InventoryController class serves as the central controller for managing medication inventory.
InventoryLoader
The InventoryLoader class is responsible for loading medication inventory data into the system.
InventorySaver
The InventorySaver class handles saving medication inventory data from the system to persistent storage.
InventoryViewer
The InventoryViewer class is responsible for displaying the current medication inventory.
Load
The Load interface defines a contract for loading data from a source.
Login
The Login class extends InputPrompt and provides functionality for verifying user login credentials against a stored user database.
LoginUI
The LoginUI class manages the login process for different user roles in the system.
LowStockChecker
The LowStockChecker class is responsible for monitoring and alerting about medications in the inventory that are below their defined alert levels.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point to the application.
MedicationInventory
The MedicationInventory class represents a medication item in the inventory with attributes such as name, current stock level, and alert level for low stock warnings.
MedicineInventoryService
The MedicineInventoryService class provides functionality for managing medication inventory data, including loading, saving, formatting, writing, and converting data to and from MedicationInventory objects.
NewPatientCreator
The NewPatientCreator class provides functionality to create a new patient in the system.
NewRequestCreator
The NewRequestCreator class is responsible for creating new stock replenishment requests for medications in the inventory.
PasswordChanger
The PasswordChanger class allows users to change their passwords.
PasswordVerifier
The PasswordVerifier class provides functionality to verify the validity of a password.
PatientAppointmentScheduler
/** The PatientAppointmentScheduler class handles appointment management for patients.
PatientAppointmentViewer
The PatientAppointmentViewer class provides functionality for patients to view their appointments and available schedules.
PatientMedicalRecord
The PatientMedicalRecord class provides functionality for patients to view their personal medical records, including appointment details, diagnoses, and prescriptions.
PatientUI
The PatientUI class provides the user interface for patients in the system.
PharmacistUI
The PharmacistUI class provides the user interface for pharmacists in the system.
Prescription
Represents a prescription associated with an appointment outcome record.
PrescriptionFlagUpdater
Handles the updating of prescription flags for appointment outcome records.
ReceptionistController
The ReceptionistController class provides the interface and functionality for a receptionist to manage system operations such as adding new patients.
RecordOutcome
Handles the process of recording appointment outcomes.
Request
 
RequestController
The RequestController class manages the workflow of handling replenishment requests for medications.
RequestFlagUpdater
The RequestFlagUpdater class is responsible for managing and updating the status (flag) of medication replenishment requests.
RequestLoader
The RequestLoader class is responsible for loading request records from an external data source into an in-memory map for processing and management.
RequestSaver
The RequestSaver class is responsible for saving request records from an in-memory map to an external data source.
RequestService
The RequestService class implements methods for handling the persistence and retrieval of Request objects.
RequestViewer
The RequestViewer class provides methods for displaying different subsets of requests, including all requests, pending requests, and requests specific to a pharmacist.
Role
The Role enum represents the different roles that a user can have in the system.
Save
The Save interface defines a contract for saving data to a specific destination.
Session
The Session class manages session-related information for a logged-in user.
StockAdjuster
The StockAdjuster class is responsible for managing stock adjustments (increase or decrease) of medications in the inventory.
Timeslot
The Timeslot class provides a list of predefined timeslots for scheduling appointments.
toObject
The toObject interface defines a contract for converting a string representation into an object.
Type
The Type enum represents the different categories of actions or events in the system.
UpdateInformation
The UpdateInformation class provides functionality for updating user information, including phone numbers and email addresses.
User
The User class represents a user in the system.
UserLoader
The UserLoader class is responsible for loading user data into a given map.
UserSaver
The UserSaver class is responsible for saving user data to an external source.
UserService
The UserService class provides functionality for managing user data, including loading from a file, saving to a file, and converting between string and object representations.
ValidateEmail
The ValidateEmail class provides functionality for validating email addresses using a regular expression pattern.
ValidatePhoneNo
The ValidatePhoneNo class provides functionality for validating phone numbers.
Write
The Write interface defines a contract for writing a list of string data to a specified destination.
